00036 #ifndef _LIBCFS_FAIL_H
00037 #define _LIBCFS_FAIL_H
00038 
00039 extern unsigned long cfs_fail_loc;
00040 extern unsigned int cfs_fail_val;
00041 extern int cfs_fail_err;
00042 
00043 extern wait_queue_head_t cfs_race_waitq;
00044 extern int cfs_race_state;
00045 
00046 int __cfs_fail_check_set(__u32 id, __u32 value, int set);
00047 int __cfs_fail_timeout_set(__u32 id, __u32 value, int ms, int set);
00048 
00049 enum {
00050         CFS_FAIL_LOC_NOSET      = 0,
00051         CFS_FAIL_LOC_ORSET      = 1,
00052         CFS_FAIL_LOC_RESET      = 2,
00053         CFS_FAIL_LOC_VALUE      = 3
00054 };
00055 
00056 /* Failure injection control */
00057 #define CFS_FAIL_MASK_SYS    0x0000FF00
00058 #define CFS_FAIL_MASK_LOC   (0x000000FF | CFS_FAIL_MASK_SYS)
00059 
00060 #define CFS_FAILED_BIT       30
00061 /* CFS_FAILED is 0x40000000 */
00062 #define CFS_FAILED          (1 << CFS_FAILED_BIT)
00063 
00064 #define CFS_FAIL_ONCE_BIT    31
00065 /* CFS_FAIL_ONCE is 0x80000000 */
00066 #define CFS_FAIL_ONCE       (1 << CFS_FAIL_ONCE_BIT)
00067 
00068 /* The following flags aren't made to be combined */
00069 #define CFS_FAIL_SKIP        0x20000000 /* skip N times then fail */
00070 #define CFS_FAIL_SOME        0x10000000 /* only fail N times */
00071 #define CFS_FAIL_RAND        0x08000000 /* fail 1/N of the times */
00072 #define CFS_FAIL_USR1        0x04000000 /* user flag */
00073 
00074 /* CFS_FAULT may be combined with any one of the above flags. */
00075 #define CFS_FAULT            0x02000000 /* match any CFS_FAULT_CHECK */
00076 
00077 static inline bool CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(__u32 id)
00078 {
00079         return cfs_fail_loc != 0 &&
00080               ((cfs_fail_loc & CFS_FAIL_MASK_LOC) == (id & CFS_FAIL_MASK_LOC) ||
00081                (cfs_fail_loc & id & CFS_FAULT));
00082 }
00083 
00084 static inline int cfs_fail_check_set(__u32 id, __u32 value,
00085                                      int set, int quiet)
00086 {
00087         int ret = 0;
00088 
00089         if (unlikely(CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(id) &&
00090                      (ret = __cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, set)))) {
00091                 if (quiet) {
00092                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "*** cfs_fail_loc=%x, val=%u***\n",
00093                                id, value);
00094                 } else {
00095                         LCONSOLE_INFO("*** cfs_fail_loc=%x, val=%u***\n",
00096                                       id, value);
00097                 }
00098         }
00099 
00100         return ret;
00101 }
00102 
00103 /* If id hit cfs_fail_loc, return 1, otherwise return 0 */
00104 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK(id) \
00105         cfs_fail_check_set(id, 0, CFS_FAIL_LOC_NOSET, 0)
00106 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_QUIET(id) \
00107         cfs_fail_check_set(id, 0, CFS_FAIL_LOC_NOSET, 1)
00108 
00109 /* If id hit cfs_fail_loc and cfs_fail_val == (-1 or value) return 1,
00110  * otherwise return 0 */
00111 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_VALUE(id, value) \
00112         cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, CFS_FAIL_LOC_VALUE, 0)
00113 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_VALUE_QUIET(id, value) \
00114         cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, CFS_FAIL_LOC_VALUE, 1)
00115 
00116 /* If id hit cfs_fail_loc, cfs_fail_loc |= value and return 1,
00117  * otherwise return 0 */
00118 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_ORSET(id, value) \
00119         cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, CFS_FAIL_LOC_ORSET, 0)
00120 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_ORSET_QUIET(id, value) \
00121         cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, CFS_FAIL_LOC_ORSET, 1)
00122 
00123 /* If id hit cfs_fail_loc, cfs_fail_loc = value and return 1,
00124  * otherwise return 0 */
00125 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_RESET(id, value) \
00126         cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, CFS_FAIL_LOC_RESET, 0)
00127 #define CFS_FAIL_CHECK_RESET_QUIET(id, value) \
00128         cfs_fail_check_set(id, value, CFS_FAIL_LOC_RESET, 1)
00129 
00130 static inline int cfs_fail_timeout_set(__u32 id, __u32 value, int ms, int set)
00131 {
00132         if (unlikely(CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(id)))
00133                 return __cfs_fail_timeout_set(id, value, ms, set);
00134         else
00135                 return 0;
00136 }
00137 
00138 /* If id hit cfs_fail_loc, sleep for seconds or milliseconds */
00139 #define CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT(id, secs) \
00140         cfs_fail_timeout_set(id, 0, (secs) * 1000, CFS_FAIL_LOC_NOSET)
00141 
00142 #define CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT_MS(id, ms) \
00143         cfs_fail_timeout_set(id, 0, ms, CFS_FAIL_LOC_NOSET)
00144 
00145 /* If id hit cfs_fail_loc, cfs_fail_loc |= value and
00146  * sleep seconds or milliseconds */
00147 #define CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT_ORSET(id, value, secs) \
00148         cfs_fail_timeout_set(id, value, (secs) * 1000, CFS_FAIL_LOC_ORSET)
00149 
00150 #define CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT_RESET(id, value, secs) \
00151         cfs_fail_timeout_set(id, value, secs * 1000, CFS_FAIL_LOC_RESET)
00152 
00153 #define CFS_FAIL_TIMEOUT_MS_ORSET(id, value, ms) \
00154         cfs_fail_timeout_set(id, value, ms, CFS_FAIL_LOC_ORSET)
00155 
00156 #define CFS_FAULT_CHECK(id)                     \
00157         CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAULT | (id))
00158 
00159 /* The idea here is to synchronise two threads to force a race. The
00160  * first thread that calls this with a matching fail_loc is put to
00161  * sleep. The next thread that calls with the same fail_loc wakes up
00162  * the first and continues. */
00163 static inline void cfs_race(__u32 id)
00164 {
00165         if (CFS_FAIL_PRECHECK(id)) {
00166                 if (unlikely(__cfs_fail_check_set(id, 0, CFS_FAIL_LOC_NOSET))) {
00167                         int rc;
00168                         cfs_race_state = 0;
00169                         CERROR("cfs_race id %x sleeping\n", id);
00170                         rc = wait_event_interruptible(cfs_race_waitq,
00171                                                       cfs_race_state != 0);
00172                         CERROR("cfs_fail_race id %x awake, rc=%d\n", id, rc);
00173                 } else {
00174                         CERROR("cfs_fail_race id %x waking\n", id);
00175                         cfs_race_state = 1;
00176                         wake_up(&cfs_race_waitq);
00177                 }
00178         }
00179 }
00180 #define CFS_RACE(id) cfs_race(id)
00181 
00182 #endif /* _LIBCFS_FAIL_H */
